title: Unsaved Data Warning
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is editing a contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks payments tab without saving first
custom_expected: THEN warning message displays prompting user to save changes made

title: Unsaved Data Warning
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is editing a contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks any of the tabs from the left navigation panel
custom_expected: THEN warning message displays prompting user to save changes made

title: 'As Of' Default
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the payments tab
custom_expected: THEN the "As of" Date will be set the July 1st of the current year.

title: Remove Payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to the payment tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trash icon next to a payment of a payment schedule
custom_expected: THEN that payment row is removed

title: Payment Source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND the player has belonged to more than one club over the course of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks payment source
custom_expected: THEN the clubs are listed in the dropdown and the user must select which club will be the payment source

title: Payment Source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND the player has belonged to one club over the course of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks payment source
custom_expected: THEN the payment source is immediately added to the payments tab

title: Calculate Payment Amount
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to a contract's payments tab
AND is in edit mode
AND has entered amounts in Principal amount and Interest Rate
AND Payment date is AFTER Accrual date
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks calculate
custom_expected: THEN payment amount populates

title: Calculate Principal Amount
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND has entered values in payment amount and interest rate
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks calculate
custom_expected: THEN principal amount populates

title: Calculate Interest Rate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND has entered values in payment and principal amount fields
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks calculate
custom_expected: THEN interest rate is populated

title: Save Changes in Payment Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND has made changes to the payment schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules checks for errors
AND loads the page in view mode
AND displays a blue successful save notification

title: Re-Add Deleted Payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has deleted a payment source from the payments tab
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks 'Payment Source'
AND clicks the deleted payment source
custom_expected:
THEN the payment source should reappear on the payments tab
AND populated values should be calculated from the contract

title: Modified Payments
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the payment tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user modifies values in the payment tab
custom_expected: THEN a visual indication displays the modified payment values

title: Change View to Modified
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has modified payments in the payment tab
AND is NOT in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'View Modified' link
custom_expected:
THEN page reloads with modified payments schedule
AND accounts for any other changes

title: Change View to Calculated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has modified a payment on the payment tab
AND is NOT in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'View Calculated' link
custom_expected:
THEN the system will ignore any changes made
AND reload with only the values entered in pay schedules

title: User navigates to payments tab without saving data
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has completed [C72694]
AND does not save changes
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the payment tab
custom_expected: THEN any edits will be lost and will not be reflected in the Payments tab

title: BOC Create new profile corresponding to spreadsheet (Agency)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to create a new Agency profile for Agencies in an uploaded spreadsheet but are not already in system
AND has a uploaded a valid spreadsheet
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects create new from the dropdowns of unmapped Agencies
AND fills out required fields as if they were in the Agency widget
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN The newly created agency profile will be shown in all agency dropdowns on the page WITHOUT the page losing any of the data entered by the user up until this point (cannot completely refresh the page)
AND the row from which the lightbox was initiated will have the value prepopulated when the user is returned to the screen.

title: Agent switching Agencies
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user wants to change the Associated Agency for an Agent
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Edit on an agent's profile 
And changes the Associated Agency
And clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN page reloads in view mode
AND any players with that agency update to have the next active agent (alphabetically)
AND Agent will be removed from any affected player's profiles
IF no active agent available, then "agent not in system" selected

title: BOC Reviews updated Agents
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has completed [C72692]
AND wants to review the Agents who will be updated as a result of the upload
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Next'
custom_expected: THEN Agents will load as a hyperlink w/dropdowns

title: No Mappings to Confirm
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has completed [C72692]
AND wants to go directly to Step 2
AND has no mappings to confirm
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Next'
custom_expected: THEN user is taken directly to Step 2

title: Confirm or Reject mappings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has completed a spreadsheet upload
AND wants to either confirm or reject an Agent's Agency info
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects confirm or reject for each row
AND clicks 'Next'
custom_expected:
THEN confirmed Agents' info changes
AND rejected Agents' info stays the same

title: Agent's info updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has completed a spreadsheet upload
AND has updated contact info for an Agent
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects confirm from the dropdown
AND clicks 'Next'
custom_expected: THEN Agent's mapping and contact info updates in the system

title: Submit confirmation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has successfully uploaded a spreadsheet
AND it contains NO errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'submit'
custom_expected:
THEN user is returned to point of entry
AND blue confirmation message with text "Updated agent to agency mappings have been saved successfully" displays

title: Importing Agent Spreadsheet with Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to import a spreadsheet
AND has permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the agent widget
custom_expected:
THEN 'Import Spreadsheet' button should be visible
AND user should be able to view and edit agent information

title: BOC clicks agent name hyperlink
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C76341]
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the hyperlink for the agent's name
custom_expected: THEN the agent's profile is opened in a new tab or window

title: Importing Agent Spreadsheet without Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user does not have Permissions to perform a spreadsheet upload
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the agent widget
custom_expected:
THEN the 'Import Spreadsheet' button should not be visible
AND the user should not be able to view or edit agent information

title: View Contact Information
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a Professional Player Profile
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the Info tab
AND expands the Contact Info
custom_expected: THEN contact info displays

title: View Agent/Agency Info
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to a professional player's profile
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the Info tab
AND expands the Agent/Agency section
custom_expected: THEN a Agent/Agency section displays

title: Edit Info Section
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to a PPP
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks edit
custom_expected: THEN fields in the info section are editable

title: Add Phone Number
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to the phone number section of a PPP
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks add phone number
custom_expected:
THEN a new field set appears
AND user must flag a primary number once multiple numbers are saved
IF only one number is saved that is the primary by default

title: Remove Phone Number
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a PPP
AND is in edit mode
AND has added multiple phone numbers
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trash can icon
custom_expected: THEN that field set is deleted

title: Save phone number (US)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to a PPP
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user adds a US phone number
AND there are less or more than 10 characters
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a format check verifying 10 numbers have been entered
AND blocker message appears

title: Edit Phone Number
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated the contact info of a PPP
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a country associated with a phone number
AND clicks save
AND the page reloads in view mode
custom_expected:
THEN the country name no longer displays
AND the country code displays

title: Add Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to the PPP
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks 'add email'
AND the user enters a valid email address
AND clicks 'save'
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a format check
AND a successful save message appears

title: Remove Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a PPP
AND is in edit mode
AND has multiple emails
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trach icon
custom_expected: THEN email is removed

title: Primary Email
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a PPP
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters an email address
IF there are multiple email addresses
custom_expected: THEN the first one entered is primary by default

title: Add Address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a PPP
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks 'add address'
AND clicks 'save'
custom_expected: THEN address saves successfully

title: Remove Address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a PPP
AND is in edit mode
AND has multiple addresses
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the trash icon
AND it is the primary address
custom_expected:
THEN the address is removed
AND the first listed address is now primary

title: US Address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a PPP
AND is in edit mode
AND selects US, Canada or US territory as their address
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'save'
custom_expected: THEN system runs a rules check to see if there is proper formatting in zip code field

title: Edit Agent/Agency
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a PPP
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on an Agency
AND selects an Agent
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the change will save
AND page reloads in view mode
AND successful save message will display

title: View Baseball Info
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user searched for a professional player
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the player's hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN the professional player profile should load

title: Edit Baseball Info- Save Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to a PPP
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN profile should save and reload in view mode
AND a successful save message will display

title: Save Info Section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on a PPP
AND is in Edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks save
custom_expected: THEN a successful save message will display

title: Edit Baseball Info- Cancel Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to a PPP
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks cancel
AND the user clicks confirm when prompted
custom_expected: THEN the system will refresh the profile in View mode, with no changes saved

title: Advance Search
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the advance search page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects 'professional player' from the 'search for' dropdown
AND applies any filters
custom_expected: THEN list of players fitting search requirements are filtered
